title: Welcome To The Artificial Intelligence Trust Council
text: Welcome to AITC, the Artificial Intelligence Trust Council, where we believe in the power of humans and human empowerment. We understand that AI is a tool that should support us, not a deity to be worshipped. That's why we're here to help solve the problem of civility, honesty, and trust online. AITC is a nostr client that focuses on empowering its users by providing them with greater privacy and clarity. By using AITC, users can take control of their personal information and ensure that their data is kept safe and secure. The goal of AITC is to give users back the power that they deserve when it comes to their own information, and to create a more transparent and trustworthy online environment.
